title: Welcome to the projects page
description: This is where I will speak about and demo projects I have worked on.

content.title: Full-Stack Personal Website
content.summary: A responsive MERN stack portfolio site that showcases my projects, technical blog posts, and interactive demos.

content.title: Phishing Email Detection with LLMs
content.summary: Built and evaluated a large language model (LLM)-based system to identify phishing emails using pre-labeled datasets from Virginia Tech and other sources.

content.title: VT Human-Powered Submarine Website
content.summary: Redesigned the VT HPS team's static site into a modern full-stack web app with better interactivity and CMS-like editing.

content.title: Chess Piece Image Classifier
content.summary: Built a deep learning classifier to recognize individual chess pieces from real-world images, achieving 91% accuracy through advanced augmentation and convolutional neural networks.

content.title: AI Interview Help Website
content.summary: Full-stack hackathon project that used GPT-3.5 to simulate mock interviews and provide personalized feedback.

content.title: HTTP 1.1 Server
content.summary: Upgraded a C-based HTTP 1.0 server to fully support HTTP 1.1 with chunking, persistent connections, and caching.

content.title: Dynamic Memory Allocator
content.summary: Designed and optimized a custom C memory allocator with 16-bin segmented free lists, compact metadata, and real heap expansion via sbrk(), balancing speed and memory reuse under stress-testing conditions.

content.title: Threadpool Library
content.summary: Developed a lightweight threadpool in C that queues tasks and runs them in parallel across multiple threads.

content.title: Custom Terminal Shell
content.summary: Wrote a terminal shell in C that parses and executes commands with minimal latency and error handling.
